alert.note: Alert for Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands; Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 27 at 11:57AM CST until January 28 at 8:00AM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Hudspeth County, southern Otero County, and portions of northwest and far east El Paso County along west slopes of area mountains. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 7 AM MST Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will be along west slope areas, canyons, ridgelines of the Franklin, Hueco, Guadeloupe Mountains and the Otero Mesa. Winds will gradually subside by Friday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands; Western El Paso County
